name: Sample tag labels and event bundles for calorimeter study
description: A sample of tag labels and event bundles commonly used for segmenting data in studies that use a calorimeter chamber.

labels.name: Null
labels.description: Average O2 and CO2 during null period is used to calculate offset

labels.name: Invalid
labels.description: Invalid data, not included in summary reports

events.name: Exercise session 1
events.note: Time the participant was doing the first exercise in the chamber.
